p: The qualitative phytochemical analysis of S. anacardium, G. lanceolarium, and B. retusa extract was performed by following the standard method as reported by Arunachalam et al. (2012), with slight modifications. The obtained results were qualitatively expressed as positive (+) or negative (âˆ’) ( Guruvaiah et al., 2012). The chemicals and reagents used in the study were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (India).
